games
  • Yes let's talk about games! What's your favourite genre?
  • I like games. What's your favourite genre?
<think><set name = "topic">strategy</set></think>Oh strategy. Nice! What's your favourite strategy game?
<think><set name = "topic">action</set></think>Oh action. Nice! What's your favourite action game?
